title: full/import/path: float64 weird behavior
body:
by **emanuele.delsozzo**: 
Hello!
I noticed a weird behavior when one uses two float64 in a binary operation (i.e sum, sub
etc.).
There are some particular numbers that return a wrong result. For instance:
2.7 + 1.2 returns 3.9000000000000004
2.7 + 2.1 returns 4.800000000000001
3.2 + 4.9 returns 8.100000000000001

What does 'go version' print?

go version go1.2 darwin/386

What steps reproduce the problem?
http://play.golang.org/p/Mt5E075ZLc
